casebody.data:
MCADAMS
v.
GOLDBERG 2018-1113 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 28, 2018 O'CONNOR, C.J., and O'DONNELL, KENNEDY, FRENCH, FISCHER, DEWINE, and DEGENARO, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

On respondent's amended motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. Motion for stay of trial-court proceedings denied as moot.
